          <title>
            <string language="en">A signal with superimposed noise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Signal mit gelegten Geräuschen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un signal avec le bruit superposé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um sinal com ruído sobreposto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un segnale con disturbo sovrapposto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σήμα με το θόρυβο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una señal con ruido sobrepuesto</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a signal with superimposed noise. Signal-to-noise ratio is the logarithm of the signal power over the noise power, and is expressed in decibels.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">decibels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">noise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">signal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">logarithm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">noise power</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">signal power</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">signal-to-noise ratio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">superimposed noise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">telecommunications</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Signal mit gelegten 
Geräuschen. Störsignalisierendes Verhältnis ist der 
Logarithmus der Signalenergie über der Rauschleistung und wird in den
Dezibel ausgedrückt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un signal avec le bruit 
superposé. Le taux signal/bruit est le logarithme de la 
puissance de signal au-dessus de la puissance de bruit, et est 
exprimé en décibels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um sinal com ruído 
sobreposto. A relação signal-to-noise é o logarítmo da 
potência do sinal sobre a potência de ruído, e é expressada nos 
decibels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un segnale con 
disturbo sovrapposto. Il rapporto segnale-rumore è il logaritmo
dell'potenza del segnale sopra l'potenza di disturbo ed è espresso 
nei decibel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα σήμα με το θόρυβο. 
Η σήματος προς θόρυβο αναλογία είναι ο λογάριθμος της 
δύναμης σημάτων πάνω στη δύναμη θορύβου, και εκφράζεται 
decibels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una señal con ruido 
sobrepuesto. La relación de transformación signal-to-noise es 
el logaritmo de la potencia de la señal sobre la potencia de ruido, y
se expresa en decibelios.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
